alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Diego County Coastal Areas; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 19 at 3:00AM PDT until March 21 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts 50 to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Orange County Coastal Areas and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Diego County Coastal Areas; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
